title: Cars.com Review Scraper
description: Extract consumer reviews for any car model from Cars.com. Provide either a direct review URL OR specify the car's make, model, and year. The scraper automatically handles pagination and extracts comprehensive review data including ratings, author information, and detailed feedback.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Direct Cars.com review URL (e.g., https://www.cars.com/research/toyota-camry-2023/consumer-reviews/). If provided, this will be used instead of make/model/year.

make.title: Car Make
make.description: Car manufacturer (e.g., Toyota, Honda, Ford, Audi). Required if not using startUrl.

model.title: Car Model
model.description: Car model name (e.g., Camry, Civic, F-150, A3). Use underscores for multi-word models (e.g., 'a3_e_tron'). Required if not using startUrl.

year.title: Model Year
year.description: Model year (e.g., 2023, 2022, 2024). Required if not using startUrl.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of reviews
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of reviews to collect. Set a limit to control runtime and costs.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for requests. Residential proxies recommended for better reliability.
